content: चीरं [चि-क्रन् दीर्घश्च; <ls>Uṇ. 2. 26</ls>] {@--1@} A rag, a tattered cloth, a long stripe or garment; <ls>Ms. 6. 6.</ls> {@--2@} A bark. {@--3@} A cloth or garment in general. {@--4@} A necklace of pearls consisting of four strings. {@--5@} A stripe, stroke, line. {@--6@} A manner of writing with strokes. {@--7@} Lead. {@--8@} A crest. {@--9@} The dress of a Buddhist priest.
